name: Infinite Onslaught
description:
This game is in Alpha and still under heavy development. It was posted to collect feedback.

The objective of the game is to survive until the last level, making as many points as you can along the way.  You will see the level displayed and a keyboard image will appear on top of the level to show what key to press to shoot. You can shoot at pretty much any object on the screen. Inanimate objects hide bonuses such as points and health points. Enemies will appear as the game progresses, and you must kill them before they kill you.

There's a patent pending on the "keyboard for shooting" idea. Contact us if you wish to license this.
